Title: First Adoption Project
Description: In parallel to strategy and plan development, technical staff should begin implementation of a first adoption project to expand cloud skills.

Title: Business Case
Description: Develop a business case to validate the financial model supporting the motivations and outcomes.

Title: Update this Cloud Adoption Plan
Description: Update this cloud adoption plan to manage effort and change.

Title: Skills readiness plan
Description: Create a plan for addressing skills readiness gaps.

Title: Deploy the modified blueprint
Description: Update the landing zone blueprint based on the impacted considerations and deploy the modified blueprint.

Title: CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint
Description: Evaluate the CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint. If the assumptions and decisions in that article align to your business and technical objectives, the blueprint can be used to create your landing zone.

Title: Update migration assessment, decision tree, and tooling
Description: Evaluate the results of the migration from the first host to inform iterative processes

Title: Migrate VMs
Description: Migrate a select group of VMs from the on-premises host to a host on Azure

Title: Extend the landing zone for VMWare
Description: Resolve defined prerequisites necessary to migrate VMWare assets to Azure

Title: Decomission Retired Assets
Description: Realize cost savings by terminating retired assets

Title: Promote Workload
Description: Tune the migrated assets based on testing feedback

Title: Optimize Workload Assets
Description: Tune the migrated assets based on observations

Title: Test Workload
Description: Validate funcationality of the workload

Description: Validate completion of prerequisites & document answers

Title: Update the migration tooling decision tree to reflect VMWare migration options
Description: Download and modify the migration tool decision tree to align to your expanded migration processes https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

Title: Document configuration
Description: Document Configuration of the VM in the User Story

Title: Update the adoption plan
Description: Update the migration plan with any process or task changes based on the first workload

Title: Document change
Description: Record the change in sizing in the parent feature, along with the reason for change

Title: Document configuration
Description: Document Configuration of the VM in the User Story

Title: Decommission
Description: Terminate or resuse the allocated resources https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/decommission

Title: Environment readiness (Landing Zone)
Description: Has the cloud migration target been established? Are the necessary migration tools in place? Has a resource organization and naming standard been set for this workload's assets? https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/prerequisites/planning-checklist

Title: Final test
Description: Validate availability of all assets before production

Title: Review Best Practices
Description: Review migration best practices to identify additional technical requirements that would aid in the success of your migration effort: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-best-practices/

Title: Migration tool choice(s)
Description: Evaluate the approach to migrate the workload based on future state architecture decisions https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

Title: Secure and Manage
Description:
Ideally governance, security, and operations have each been factored into the operating model for your cloud environments. If they have not, take a moment to validate security and management constraints for this asset.
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/secure-and-manage
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/secure-and-manage/

Title: Review Expanded Scope Checklist

Title: Manual test with power users

Title: Migrate
Description:
Leverage the define migration solution to automate migration of the asset to the cloud. This step may be best executed as a single task for all assets associated with this workload.
